price: Iyon ba ay higit na mabuti bilang tuluyan o ang puno ng zaqqūm?
arabic: أَذَٰلِكَ خَيۡرٞ نُّزُلًا أَمۡ شَجَرَةُ ٱلزَّقُّومِ

version.title: Filipino (Tagalog) Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Tagalog by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: adhālika khayrun nuzulan am shajaratu al-zaqūmi
